attributes.action: Sue Gray Report to be submitted in full to The Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.additional_details:
In the spirit of honesty and transparency. 
The report into the alleged breach of lockdown rules at No's.10 and 11 Downing Street, Government Departments and Conservative Party Offices must be published in full and unredacted.
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister has not confirmed that the report will be published in full once the Police investigation is complete.
Parliament should permit and instruct Sue Gray to submit the report to the Speaker of the House in full for publication

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606960
